In this interview, Ou recalls how he went to dig fern roots in mountains because his family were starving after the people's commune canteen was established, and how many people were criticized during that period.
欧仁基（1937年生）是湖南省石门县白云乡鸡鸣桥村村民。在这段口述中，欧老人回忆了兴办食堂时期全家吃不饱，欧老人上山挖厥根的故事，以及当时整人批斗风盛行的情况。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Qin Guizhen (b. 1930) is a resident of Jimingqiao Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Qin recalls how she and her husband were criticized because of the landlord class status during the Cultural Revolution, and how her husband was jailed in a middle school and finally committed suicide. The filmmaker's description of this interview has been translated into English.
覃贵珍（1930年生）湖南省石门县白云乡鸡鸣桥村村民。在这段口述中，覃老人回忆了文革时期老人家因地主身份接受批斗，覃老人老伴被关押在一所中学，最后自杀身亡的故事。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Tang Dongying (b. 1938) is a resident of Jimingqiao Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Tang recalls how her husband attempted suicide after being labeled as a counter-revolutionary, how her children were discriminated at school because of their father's status, and how she and the four children were starving at home because the only manpower in the family, the father, was in jail. The filmmaker's description of this interview has been translated into English.
唐冬英（1938年生）是湖南省石门县白云乡鸡鸣桥村村民。在这段口述中，唐老人回忆了文革时期，唐老人丈夫被打成反革命差点上吊，唐老人子女被歧视欺负，家里经济困难差点被饿死的情况。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Tang Chaogao (b. 1944) is a resident of Jimingqiao Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Tang briefly talks about how he ate tree bark and grass seeds because of starvation when running the people's commune canteen.
唐超告（1944年生）是湖南省石门县白云乡鸡鸣桥村村民。在这段口述中，唐老人简要讲述了兴办食堂期间吃不饱，吃树皮、草籽等充饥的经历。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Yang Guanya (b. 1946) is a resident of Jimingqiao Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Yang recalls how he and his fellow pupils were forced to drop out of elementary to work, and how his village built a big earthen kiln to construct blast furnace during the Great Leap Forward. Yang also recounted in detail how every household took their own rice and bowls to the people's commune canteen to cook together, and how people collected wild herbs to eat because of hunger in this period.
杨官亚（1946年生）湖南省石门县白云乡鸡鸣桥村村民。在这段口述中，杨老人回忆了大跃进时期自己所在的小学发动学生不上课参加劳动，村里开土窑炼铁的情况。杨老人还回忆了吃食堂时期每家拿着米和碗到食堂统一蒸制的，以及在食堂吃不饱吃野菜充饥的情况。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Li Zishan (b. 1933) is a resident of Jimingqiao Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Li recalls how his father stuffed to death when betting on rice with other people. Li also talks about his own experience of working day and night and stealing wheat to eat when starving.
李子山（1933年生）是湖南省石门县白云乡鸡鸣桥村村民。在这段口述中，李老人讲述了自己父亲以米饭为赌注和别人打赌撑死，以及自己日夜劳动、饿了的时候偷麦子吃的情况。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Li Yuanqin (b. 1934) is a resident of Jimingqiao Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Li recalls how the villagers were forced to work at night, how mud, lime, and soybean powder were used to make fake fertilizer to pass the superior authority's review, and how the bones of some villagers' ancestors were digged out of tombs to obtain farming fertilizer. Li worked for the people's commune canteen, where she witnessed Su Jinzhen, a blind woman villager, snatching food from other people, and some men villagers betting food coupons. The filmmaker's description of this interview has been translated into English.
李元芹（1934年生）是湖南省石门县白云乡鸡鸣桥村村民。在这段口述中，李老人讲述了大跃进期间夜里出工，用泥巴、石灰、黄豆粉伪造肥料应付检查，以及挖村民祖坟做肥料的情况。李老人还讲述了兴办食堂期间，自己在食堂工作见到的瞎眼的苏金珍抢饭吃、男人用饭票作赌注打赌的情况。

did.unittitle: Zhubaqiao Village | 常德市石门县白云乡竹坝桥村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Zhubaqiao Village is located in Shimen County, Changde City, Hunan Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and filmed by Jia Zhitan.
竹坝桥村位于湖南省常德市石门县白云乡。村民的录像采访人是贾之坦。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Huang Meide (b. 1919) is a resident of Zhuba Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Huang recalls how she was starving at the people's commune canteen, and how her son and several older villagers died of starvation. Huang also recalls the villagers were forced to work at night, and the bones of some villagers' ancestors were digged out of tombs in order to obtain farming fertilizer during the Great Leap Forward. The filmmaker's descriptions of this interview have been translated into English.
黄梅德（1919年生）是湖南省石门县白云乡竹坝桥村村民。在这段口述中，黄老人讲述了1958年兴办公社食堂时吃不饱挨饿，自己儿子及村里几位老人饿死的情况。黄老人还回忆了大跃进期间夜里也要出工劳动，以及为了积累肥料挖村民祖坟的情况。

did.unittitle: Baiyangshan Village | 常德市石门县白云乡白羊山村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Baiyangshan Village is located in Shimen County, Changde City, Hunan Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and filmed by Jia Zhitan.
白羊山村位于湖南省常德市石门县白云乡。村民的录像采访人是贾之坦。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Xiong Xuezhen (b. 1923) is a resident of Baiyangshan Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Xiong recalls how the women villagers were forced to make charcoal in the mountains and how the bones of tomb owners without progenies were digged out to make farming fertilizers after the people's commune canteen was established. Xiong also recounts how her family survived the famine because she and her husband were working for the canteen.
熊雪珍（1923年生）湖南省石门县白云乡白羊山村村民。在这段口述中，熊老人回忆了1958年兴办食堂期间村里妇女带着小孩去山上烧炭、没有后人的墓主被挖出来做肥料、以及自己和老伴的工作与伙食有关全家免于饿死的情况。

did.unittitle: Baiyun Xiang | 常德市石门县白云乡

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Baiyun Xiang is located in Shimen County, Changde City, Hunan Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and filmed by Jia Zhitan.
白云乡位于湖南省常德市石门县。村民的录像采访人是贾之坦。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Jia Zhixiu is a resident of Zhuxiangkou Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. Jia was briefly mentioned in the interviews of Xiao Kaihan and Jia Zhenwen. Jie Zhixiu and Xiao Kaihan were village officials in charge of public security during the construction of Heping Reservoir, their job was to catch the enemy of the people.
贾之修是湖南省石门县白云乡竹巷口村村民。贾的情况出现在肖开汉和贾珍文的口述中。贾之修和肖开汉是修和平水库时负责治安的村干部，负责抓阶级敌人。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Li Zifu is a resident of Jimingqiao Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. Li Zifu is Wu Yumei's husband. Li recalled his experience at the coal mine in 1958.
李子富是湖南省石门县白云乡鸡鸣桥村村民。李子富是吴玉梅的丈夫。在这段口述中，李老人讲述了自己五八年在煤矿的经历。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Peng Gong'e (b. 1938) is a resident of Zhuxiangkou Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. She's Wang Jisheng's wife. In this interview, Peng recalls how Hu Huanzhong was caught stealing rice from commue canteen and was beaten by village official. Her parents and many brothers and sisters suffered from starvation. Because her husband was a vilage official their life was bearable during the Commue Canteen period and she was probably the only woman who got pregnant in those days.
彭功娥（1938年生）是湖南省石门县白云乡竹巷口村村民，王吉生妻子。在这段口述中，彭老人回忆兴办公社食堂时期，村民胡中焕偷食堂的米被村干部毒打。李未出嫁时，全家兄弟姐妹多经常挨饿。婚后因为他丈夫王吉生是村官，生活过得去，可能是村里唯一在食堂期间怀孕的妇女。

did.unittitle: Baiyunqiao Village | 常德市石门县白云乡白云桥村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Baiyunqiao Village is located in Shimen County, Changde City, Hunan Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and filmed by Jia Zhitan.
白云桥村位于湖南省常德市石门县白云乡。村民的录像采访人是贾之坦。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Long Tianjian (b. 1934), the third uncle of the interviewer, Jia Zhitan, is a resident of Baiyuanqiao Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Long talks about three fellow villagers, who died of starvation, and his father, who was beaten to death for stealing the people's commune canteen's grains. Long also recalls how every household's cooking pots were confiscated for constructing blast furnace, and how some villagers were beaten by the leaders for eating too much or too early when participating in the project of Heping Reservoir during the Great Leap Forward.
龙天建（1934年生）是湖南省石门县白云乡白云桥村村民，是采访者——贾之坦——的三舅。在这段口述中，龙老人讲述了兴办食堂时村里饿死的三位村民，以及自己父亲因为偷公社的谷子被打死的情况。龙老人还回忆了大跃进时期没收各家各户的锅以大炼钢铁，以及1959年修和平水库时有村民因为多吃饭或早吃饭挨干部打的情况。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Long Xinye (b. 1944) is a resident of Baiyunqiao Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Long recounted in detail how he obtained more food in the people's commune canteen with counterfeit food coupons made by himself. The filmmaker's description of this interview has been translated into English.
龙心叶（1944年生）是湖南省石门县白云乡白云桥村村民。在这段口述中，龙老人详细讲述了自己用六两的饭票伪造一斤的饭票、去公社食堂多领饭的过程。

did.unittitle: Shixiangkou Village | 常德市石门县白云乡石巷口村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Shixiangkou Village is located in Shimen County, Changde City, Hunan Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and filmed by Jia Zhitan.
石巷口村位于湖南省常德市石门县白云乡。村民的录像采访人是贾之坦。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Li Yinzhen (b. 1944) is a resident of Zhuxiangkou Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Li recalls that her family suffered from hunger when eating at the people's commune canteen, and thus her father died, her mother went blind, and one of her sisters die of smallpox. Li also talks about some villagers, who escaped from the reservoir construction site because of starvation. The filmmaker's description of this interview has been translated into English.
李银珍（1944年生）是湖南省石门县白云乡竹巷口村村民。在这段口述中，李老人回忆兴办公社食堂时期，自己还未出嫁，全家姐妹七人和父母一起挨饿，结果父亲病逝，一个妹妹得天花去世，母亲因病失明。李老人还讲述了修水库的村民因为挨饿偷跑回家的情况。

did.unittitle: Shuixiyu Village | 常德市石门县白云乡水溪峪村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Shuixiyu Village is located in Shimen County, Changde City, Hunan Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and filmed by Jia Zhitan.
水溪峪村位于湖南省常德市石门县白云乡。村民的录像采访人是贾之坦。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Deng Mingxin (b. 1933) is a resident of Shuixiyu Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Deng recalls how people were so hungry during the Great Famine that they ate pig food, and how he went to his aunt's house to seek for food.
邓明欣（1933年生）湖南省石门县白云乡水溪峪村村民。在这段口述中，邓老人回忆了大饥荒时期人们饿到偷猪食吃的情况，以及他到他姑姑家找吃的一些故事。

did.unittitle: Wangjiayan Village | 常德市石门县白云乡王家堰村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Wangjiayan Village is located in Shimen County, Changde City, Hunan Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and filmed by Jia Zhitan.
王家堰村位于湖南省常德市石门县白云乡。村民的录像采访人是贾之坦。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Chen Xiangzhen (b. 1940) is a resident of Wangjiayan Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Chen tells the story of a couple in her village during the Great Famine. To save more food coupons for her husband, the sick wife asked the husband to drown her in a river. But after his wife's death the husband committed suicide by hanging.
陈香珍（1940年生）湖南省石门县白云乡王家堰村村民。在这段口述中，陈老人回忆了同村另一对老人在大饥荒年间因为粮食紧张，病重的老婆让老伴把自己推到河里淹死，老伴后来上吊自杀的惨剧。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Zhao Yongyao (b. 1929), who worked as the leader of the production team, is a resident of Wangjiayan Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Wang recalls how he led the "sister group" to conduct farming experiment, how 95% of the reservoir workers had been tied and beaten, and how the bone of some villagers' ancestors were digged out of tombs and then were boiled to make farming fertilizer. Zhao estimates that 18 villagers died of starvation when running the people's commune canteen. Zhao also mentions that few babies were born during 1958 and 1961. The filmmaker's description of this interview has been translated into English.
赵永耀（1929年生）是湖南省石门县白云乡王家堰村村民，曾担任生产队干部。在这段口述中，赵老人讲述了自己在大跃进期间率领"姐妹队"进行种田实验，修和平水库的百分之九十五的人都遭捆打，为了提高农田产量打狗挖坟、熬肉和骨头做肥料的情况。赵老人估算村里食堂饿死18个人，另外1958年至1961年期间出生的孩子很少。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Wang Jisheng (b. 1930) is a resident of Wangjiayan Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. Wang was the communist party leader of the party, so he did not suffer from hunger. In this interview, Wang recalls how village leaders implemented the superior leadership's orders strictly, such as forcing the villagers to work in the field before dawn, digging the dead bodies of villagers' ancestors out of tombs, and so on.
王吉生（1930年生）是湖南省石门县白云乡王家堰村村民。大饥荒年间王老人是村支书，没有挨饿，但是王老人回忆了兴办食堂期间村里严格按照上头指示开展工作（比如天不亮就让村民出工劳动，及挖村民祖坟）的情况。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Long Tianyuan (b. 1938) is a resident of Wangjiayan Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. She is aunt of the interviewer, Jia Zhitan, and married a man in Wangjiayan Village in 1958. That year, Long carried charcoal for constructing blast furnace during the daytime, and attended the review meeting of the production team at night in 1958. In the winter of 1959, the men villagers stripped to waist and the women villagers only wore summer clothing when constructing the Heping Reservoir. The tombstones of some villagers' ancestors' tombs were used to build roads and the reservoir. Long also talks about several fellow villagers, who died of starvation after the people's commune canteen was established, and one villager, who committed suicide after stealing the canteen's soybeans. Long also recounts in detail how she was afflicted during the Great Leap Forward and the Great Famine because her husband's class status was rich farmer, and how her husband died in a coal mine in 1960. The filmmaker's description of this interview has been translated into English.

龙天元（1938年生）是湖南省石门县白云乡王家堰村村民。龙老人是采访者——贾之坦——的姨妈，1958年嫁到王家堰村。在这段口述中，龙老人讲述了1958年大炼钢铁时自己白天挑木炭、晚上参加生产队总结会，1959年冬天男人光着上身、女人穿着单衣修和平水库，以及挖村民祖坟的墓碑修公路和水库的情况。龙老人还谈到了兴办公社食堂时饿死的几位村民，一位偷了食堂的黄豆害怕挨批斗而上吊自杀的村民。龙老人还详细谈到了丈夫家因为阶级成分是富农，在大跃进和大饥荒时期处处受到刁难以及丈夫1960年死在外地煤矿的经历。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Liu Renci (b. 1938) is a resident of Xuanzhongyu Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Liu recalls how the people's commune canteen did not have enough food, though; the villagers were not allowed to cook in their own house. Liu also talks about how he survived the Great Famine thanks to the stolen food coupons given by an acquaintance.
刘仁慈（1938年生）湖南省石门县白云乡王家堰村村民。在这段口述中，刘老人回忆了食堂粮食供给不足还不准村民私自开火的故事，以及自己靠熟人偷来的饭票扛过饥荒的情况。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Liu Yuzhen (b. 1919) is a resident of Wangjiayan Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Liu recalls how her in-laws died of starvation and how some villagers were forced to stand for eating grass seeds when running the people's commune canteen.
刘玉珍（1919年生）是湖南省石门县白云乡王家堰村村民。在这段口述中，刘老人讲述了吃食堂时期自己的公公婆婆挨饿致死，以及有村民吃草籽充饥被罚站的情况。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Yan Daru (b. 1928) is a resident of Wangjiayan Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Yan recalls how people stripped to waist to build the Heping Reservoir, and how the lazy villager were punished by the production team leaders to kneel on the urine bucket.
晏大如（1928年生）是湖南省石门县白云乡王家堰村村民。在这段口述中，晏老人讲述了1959年修和平水库时号召光着上身劳动，干活偷懒的村民被生产队干部罚跪尿桶的情况。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Tang Xishu (b. 1950) is a resident of Jimingqiao Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Tang recalls his father, who was beaten for being reluctant to join the mutual aid team, and his older brother, who committed suicide because he was reproached by the production team leader for selling wild herb to road workers. Tang also talks about a peer villager, who died of starvation with his eyes open. The filmmaker's description of this interview has been translated into English.
唐西树（1950年生）是湖南省石门县白云乡鸡鸣桥村村民。在这段口述中，唐老人讲述了自己父亲因为不愿意入互助合作社被批斗殴打，自己哥哥1958年挖野菜卖给修公路的人、被生产队干部斥责后上吊自杀的情况。唐老人还谈到了一位饿死后不瞑目的同龄人。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Wang Fuying (b. 1929) is a resident of Wangjiayan Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Wang recalls how her house was hardly pulled out to build a pig farm after the people's commune canteen was established. Wang also talks about how the bones of some villagers' ancestors were digged out of tombs to make farming fertilizers.
王福英（1929年生）是湖南省石门县白云乡王家堰村村民。在这段口述中，王老人回忆了兴办公社食堂期间，自己家房子差点被拆了盖猪场的故事，以及村里人挖坟用死人做肥料的情况。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Wang Hongying (b. 1932) is a resident of Wangjiayan Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Wang recalls how her family was bullied and criticized (eg. the bones of their ancestors were digged out of tombs to make farming fertilizers) by the local leaders and fellow villagers because of their class status.
王宏英（1932年生）湖南省石门县白云乡王家堰村村民。在这段口述中，王老人回忆了大饥荒时期王老人家因为阶级成分被村民和村干部欺压、批斗（比如，家里人的祖坟被挖了做肥料）的情况。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Yang Qiuzhen (b. 1932) is a resident of Wangjiayan Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Yang recalls how she and her husband were bullied by the local leaders after the people's commune canteen was established while she made every effort to resist the oppression. Yang also recounts how her family survived the famine because of the vegetables she stole from the canteen. The filmmaker's description of this interview has been translated into English.
杨求珍（1932年生）湖南省石门县白云乡王家堰村村民。在这段口述中，杨老人回忆了兴办食堂期间杨老人自己及丈夫受干部欺压，而她一直据理力争反抗干部的的情况。杨老人同时回忆了当年偷食堂的菜回家才让全家免于被饿死的情况。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Yang Guangyue (b. 1928) is a resident of Wangjiayan Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. Yang married a man in Wangjiayan Village in 1954. Her parents' class status was landlord, and her in-laws' was rich peasant. In this interview, Yang recalls how the people's commune canteen had adequate food supplies at the beginning and later lacked food. At this time the local leaders forbid villagers from eating wild herbs and tree bark because this would bring shame on the commune canteen. Because of complaining about the production team demolishing their house, Yang was punished to kneel and her father-in-law was criticised to death. In 1959, Yang was punished to run with a wooden horse on her back for refusing to join the "sister group" of the production team. The filmmaker's description of this interview has been translated into English.
杨广月（1928年生）是湖南省石门县白云乡王家堰村村民。她1954年嫁到该村，自己娘家的阶级成分是地主，丈夫家的阶级成分是富农。在这段口述中，杨老人讲述了1958年兴办公社食堂一开始食物充足、后面食物匮乏时干部不允许村民吃野菜、树皮等充饥，因为这是给食堂抹黑。该时期生产队拆掉杨老人家的房屋、杨老人抱怨被罚跪，公公被批斗致死。1959年杨老人因为不愿意参加生产队的"姊妹队"，被罚背着木马跑步。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Chen Anquan (b. 1933) is a resident of Wangjiayan Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. Chen married a man in Wangjiayan Village in 1933. In this interview, Chen recalls how her in-laws' family were often criticized because their class status was landlord after the people's commune canteen was established. Chen also recounts how her mother-in-law died after being criticized for taking the canteen's turnips back home for Chen, who was pregnant then.
陈安全（1933年生）湖南省石门县白云乡王家堰村村民。她1947年嫁到该村。在这段口述中，陈老人回忆了大饥荒年间，陈家因为地主成分被批斗，陈老人的婆婆因为从食堂带萝卜回家给怀孕的陈老人吃而被批斗致死的情况。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Peng Gongying (b. 1938) is a resident of Wangjiayan Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In 1957 Peng married Wang Jisheng, who was the leader of Wangjiangyan Village. In this interview, Peng recalls how Zhao, the production team leader, beat a villager for stealing rice from the people's commune canteen.
彭功英（1938年）是湖南省石门县白云乡王家堰村村民。彭老人1957年嫁到王家堰村，丈夫曾——王吉生——曾担任村支书。在这段口述中，彭老人讲述了生产队队长——赵＊＊——毒打一个偷食堂的米的村民的情况。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Liu Bocheng (b. 1932) is a resident of Wangjiayan Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Liu recounts his experience of being labeled as one member of a counter-revolutionary group during the Cultural Revolution because he had a close relationship with the communist party leader of the production team, who had been labeled as a counter-revolutionary. At first Liu was captured, interrogated, and criticized in a school with the other counter-revolutionaries. Later he was jailed in the Police Department of the county for one year until he was rehabilitated in 1971. The filmmaker's description of this interview has been translated into English.
刘伯成（1923年生）是湖南省石门县白云乡王堰村村民。在这段口述中，刘老人回忆了文革期间，自己因为和被打为反革命的大队支书关系好而被打成"反革命集团"一员的故事。刘老人一开始被其他"反革命"一起被关在学校受审，被群众批斗，后来被关到公安局，直到一年后（1971年）平反才被放了出来。

did.unittitle: Xuanzhongyu Village | 常德市白门县白云乡悬中峪村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Xuanzhongyu Village is located in Shimen County, Changde City, Hunan Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and filmed by Jia Zhitan.
悬钟峪村位于湖南省常德市石门县白云乡。村民的录像采访人是贾之坦。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Zhao Yuanyun (b. 1950) is a resident of Xuanzhongyu Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Zhao recounted how his classmate, Zhao, attempted suicide several times because he was often criticized for his landlord class status.
赵远云（1950年生）湖南省石门县白云乡悬中峪村村民。在这段口述中，赵老人回忆了同村的董学元因地主身份挨整几次试图自杀的故事。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Xiao Kaihua (b. 1929) is a resident of Xuanzhongyu Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Xiao recalls how he survived the Great Famine because he served the production team with his tailoring skills. Xiao also talks about an old man, who passed out because of hunger, and the hungry wild jackals, which came to the village to eat children. The filmmaker's description of this interview has been translated into English.
肖开化（1929年生）湖南省石门县白云乡水悬钟峪村村民。在这段口述中，肖老人讲述了自己利裁缝手艺为生产队服务，所以在饥荒年间没有挨饿的故事。肖老人还回忆了该时期村里老人饿死，村外豺狼饿极进村叼小孩的情况。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Xiang Ma (b. 1937) is a resident of Xuanzhongyu Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Xiang Ma recalls how she ate the bark of loquat tree during the Great Famine, and how she did not have enough money to treat her daughter's arthritis, which resulted in a sequela.
项妈（1937年生）是湖南省石门县白云乡水悬钟峪村村民。在这段口述中，项妈回忆了大饥荒年间吃枇杷树皮充饥，以及女儿关节炎没钱买药留下后遗症的情况。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Xiao Kaihan (b. 1932) is a resident of Xuanzhongyu Village, Baiyun Town, Shimen County, Hunan Province. Xiao worked as a commander of the local people's militia and the security director of the production team. In this interview, Xiao recounts how two other security leaders tied and beat production team members who worked for the project of Heping Reservoir in the winter of 1959. In the contrary, Xiao recounts how he himself took advantage of his position to save three villagers, who snatched or stole food to eat. The filmmaker's description of this interview has been translated into English.
肖开汉（1932年生）是湖南省石门县白云乡悬钟峪村村民。肖老人1957年从部队复员回家，担任生产队的民办营长兼治保主任。在这段口述中，肖老人介绍1959年冬修和平水库时，负责治安的另外两名干部经常捆绑吊打劳动的社员。但肖老人讲述了自己凭借职务之便，救了三位抢饭或偷饭吃的村民的故事。

did.unittitle: Datang Village | 怀化市溆浦县双井镇大塘村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Datang Village is located in Xupu County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and flimed by Shu Qiao.
大塘村位于湖南省怀化市溆浦县双井镇。村民的录像采访人是舒侨。

did.unittitle: Huakou Village | 怀化市溆浦县双井镇化口村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Huakou Village is located in Xupu County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and flimed by Shu Qiao.
化口村位于湖南省怀化市溆浦县双井镇。村民的录像采访人是舒侨。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Xiang Layun (b.1930) is a resident of Huakou Village, Shuangjing Town, Xupu County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province. In this interview, Xiang recalls life during Land Reform and Great Famine. For the Land Reform they struggled the landlords and confiscated their properties, and each person in her family was distributed one mu of land. When People's Communal canteen started, people could eat as much as they liked, but later food supply became limited and was not enough. The Production Team stole food collectively and distributed to each family, so not many people starved to death.
向腊云1930年出生，是湖南省怀化市溆浦县双井镇化口村的村民。在这段口述中，向老人回忆了土改以及大饥荒时期的生活。土改时打地主，抄地主的家，她家每个人都分到了一亩地。开始吃食堂的时候随便吃，后来发定粮不够吃，队里统一去偷粮食分给每家人，所以他们没怎么饿死人。

did.unittitle: Shuangjing Village | 怀化市溆浦县双井镇双井村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Shuangjing Village is located in Xupu County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and flimed by Shu Qiao.
双井村位于湖南省怀化市溆浦县双井镇。村民的录像采访人是舒侨。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Xie Lide (b.1946) is a resident of Shuangjing Village, Shuangjing Town, Xupu County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province. He is Luo Yunbi's husband. In this interview, Xie talks about experiences during the Great Famine and Cultural Revolution. Helong meal began in 1958, he was in the fifth grade and only had six liang of food every day; not able to get full, he always ate sugar canes in the farm. He also remembers all kinds of food back then, people who died in the Production Team, and how they exchanged food from people in the mountainous areas with worn-out clothes and even daughters' marriages. During the Cultural Revolution he was in the army in Yantai, Shandong Province, and experienced class struggles every day. He especially cannot forget the incident of power seizure by the red guards that took place in 1967. The filmmaker's description of this interview has been translated into English.

谢历德1946年出生，是湖南省怀化市溆浦县双井镇双井村的村民。他是罗运碧的丈夫。在这段口述中，谢老人讲述了大饥荒以及文化大革命时期的经历。1958年开始吃合拢饭，上小学五年级的他每天只有六两米饭，成天吃不饱，到地里用甘蔗充饥。他也回忆了当时的各种食物，队里死的人，以及用破衣服甚至嫁女儿的方法和山里人换吃的的情况。文革时期他在烟台当兵，每天都经历这阶级斗争。他尤其难忘1967年在那发生的红卫兵夺权事件。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Xie Yusui (b. 1939) was born in Shuangjing Village, Shuangjing Town, Xupu County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province. In this interview, Xie describes the difficulties since the beginning of the Great Leap Forward. Due to food shortage, people stole from the farm, the mountain or vegetable gardens. Later on, they carried coal for People's Commune Canteen from Haicongwan everyday. After 1960 when people began eating at the canteen, three people in her family (father, aunt, uncle) died, and so did many others living in her courtyard. The filmmaker's description of this interview has been translated into English.
谢玉穗1939年出生于湖南省怀化市溆浦县双井镇双井村。在这段口述中，谢老人 讲述了大跃进开始后的辛苦。因为没有食物，人们去田里，山上或者菜园里偷食。后来他们每天帮食堂到害丛湾挑煤炭。1960年吃大食堂饭后，她的家里饿死了三口人（父亲，伯母，伯伯），同时院子里也死了好多。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Shu Youying (b.1940) is a resident of Shuangjing Village, Shuangjing Town, Xupu County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province. In this interview, Shu remembers life during the Great Famine. When eating at People's Commune canteen, she helped looking after the children at the Production Team, and had 4 liang of rice every day. Her father who worked at the canteen ate meat of dead pig and died of sickness.
舒友英1940年出生，是湖南省怀化市溆浦县双井镇双井村的村民。在这段口述中，舒老人回忆了大饥荒期间的生活。吃食堂的时候，她在队里帮带孩子，一天4两米。当时在食堂做事的父亲吃了死猪肉之后病死了。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Zhang Guixiu (b. 1933) is a resident of Shuangjing Village, Shuangjing Town, Xupu County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province. In this interview, Zhang recalls her experience during the Great Leap Forward. Back then, she saved the food from the People's Commune canteen and what she found from outside for her children. If she went out working, the children would be left at home by themselves. One time, she carried her little son (who has died of illness) to the field when she was sick. The filmmaker's description of this interview has been translated into English.
张贵休1933年出生，是湖南省怀化市溆浦县双井镇双井村的村民。在这段口述中，张老人回忆了大饥荒期间的经历。那时，她把食堂的饭和外面找来的野菜都留给孩子们吃。出去干活时家里的孩子就没人照看。有一次她生病还把小儿子（已病故）背着去耕田。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Shu Qingyou (b.1930) is a resident of Shuangjing Village, Shuangjing Town, Xupu County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province. In this interview, Shu recalls experiences during the Land Reform, Great Leap Forward, and Great Famine. When Land Reform began in 1950, he was the squadron leader of the militiamen and was in charge of the military equipment; together with the new team, he criticized the landlords and divided their possessions. During the Great Leap Forward, the yield was falsely reported as a result of proneness to boasting and exaggeration. He remembers that some one made a complaint and was then critized on the same night. Later there was no food when eating at the People's Communal canteen, the Commune members ate secretly while the cadres snatched the food, and the ordinary folks also stole everywhere. Many people got the edema disease, and those almost starving to death were sent to the elder's home for treatment, most of who died as well.
舒清友1930年出生，是湖南省怀化市溆浦县双井镇双井村的村民。在这段口述中，舒老人回忆了土改，大跃进以及大饥荒期间的经历。1950年土改开始后，他是民兵中队长，负责管武装，和新班子一起清算地主、分财产。大跃进时因为浮夸风都虚报产量。他记得有人发了句牢骚晚上就被批斗了。后来吃食堂没有粮食，社员偷着吃干部抢着吃，老百姓也四处去偷。很多人得了水肿病，快饿死的人都被送到养老院去调养，但大部分也都死了。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Shu Qingliang (b.1941) is a resident of Shuangjing Village, Shuangjing Town, Xupu County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province. In this interview, Shu remembers life during the Great Leap Forward and Great Famine. His narration covers experiences such as People's Commune, constructing blast furnace, and struggle sessions. Speaking of starvation, he believes that peasants lacked autonomy then and must submit to unreasonable decisions made by the Production Team. Fortunately, he was working at a sugar factory and gained nutrition from sugar canes. The filmmaker's description of this interview has been translated into English.
舒清亮1941年出生，是湖南省怀化市溆浦县双井镇双井村的村民。在这段口述中，舒老人回忆了大跃进和大饥荒期间的生活。他讲述了人民公社，大炼钢铁，以及批斗等大跃进的经历。说起挨饿的苦日子，他认为农民没有自主，必须服从生产队不合理的决定。幸运的是，当时在糖厂工作的他靠甘蔗补充了营养。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Shu Caili (b.1933) is a resident of Shuangjing Village, Shuangjing Town, Xupu County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province. In this interview, He remembers life during the Great Famine. He passed away in early 2012.
舒采礼1933年出生，是湖南省怀化市溆浦县双井镇双井村的村民。在这段口述中，舒老人回忆了大饥荒期间的生活。舒老人2012年初过世。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Luo Yunbi (b.1949) is a resident of Shuangjing Village, Shuangjing Town, Xupu County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province. In this interview, Luo recalls her experiences during the Great Famine and Cultural Revolution. People began eating "Helong meal" (eating with unlimited supply) in early 1959, but food began running short later in the same year. Her father was the branch secretary and forbade anyone in the family from stealing. Luo believes that since it was not long after "liberation", food was not abundant due to underdeveloped technology. During the Cultural Revolution, Luo was the Women Team leader and went around for meetings, working and embroidering Mao images; besides, she had to ask for instructions in the morning and report results in the evening. At that time, all cadres were deemed as "capitalist roaders in power" and had to be struggled; sometimes sons even rebelled against fathers. The filmmaker's description of this interview has been translated into English.

罗运碧1949年出生，是湖南省溆浦县双井镇双井村的村民。在这段口述中，罗老人回忆了大饥荒和文革期间的经历。1959年上半年开始吃"合拢饭"，可到了下半年粮食就紧张起来了。父亲是支部书记，不允许家里人去偷东西吃。1960年饿死了不少人，但食堂的伙夫都没挨饿。她说当时刚解放不久，科技不发达，所以粮食不丰富。文革时期罗运碧是妇女队队长，到处去开会、绣毛主席像、干活，每天要"早请示晚汇报"。当时做干部的就被看作当权派，要被打倒，有的儿子还造父亲的反。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Shu Degao (b.1938) is a resident of Shuangjing Village, Shuangjing Town, Xupu County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province. In this interview, Shu recalls his experience during the Land Reform, Great Famine and Cultural Revolution. Those who used to be bandits and bullies were all caught and executed during the Land Reform. While eating at People's Commune canteen, he was a first class labor who worked a lot and starved. Things that nobody would eat nowadays were all precious food back then. He says that during the Cultural Revolution, stubborn people tended to get struggled, but he did not suffer too much. The filmmaker's description of this interview has been translated into English.
舒德高1938年出生，是湖南省怀化市溆浦县双井镇双井村的村民。在这段口述中，舒老人回忆了土改、大饥荒以及文革期间的经历。 曾经的土匪、恶霸 土改时都被抓住了枪毙。 吃食堂的时候他是一等劳力，吃不饱但要干很多活。现在没人吃的东西当时都是珍贵的食物。文革时顽固的人容易被斗争，而他并没有受委屈。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Liu Guihua (b.1937) is a resident of Shuangjing Village, Shuangjing Town, Xupu County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province. In this interview, Liu remembers life during the Great Famine. She came here as a child bride when she was 14, and got married at 16. When eating at People's Commune canteen, there was not much to eat，and people ate al kinds of things. She also remembers some people who starved to death then.
刘闺华1937年出生，是湖南省怀化市溆浦县双井镇双井村的村民。在这段口述中，刘老人回忆了大饥荒期间的生活。她14岁时以童养媳的形式嫁过来，16岁的结婚。在吃食堂的时候，没得吃，人们什么都吃。她也记得一些当时饿死的人。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Shan Zailian (b. 1947)is a resident of Shuangjing Village, Shuangjing Town, Xupu County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province. In this interview, Shan recalls life during the Great Famine and Cultural Revolution. In 1958, people first had "Helong meal" (eating freely with unlimited supply,) and later at People's Commune canteen (many people starved to death then). For taking care of five children, her father often looked for food outside and had eaten all kinds of wild weeds. People sometimes worked all night at the Production Team, and work points would be deducted if they were found stealing grains. In 1968, she got married and moved to Shuangjing village, where life was still hard; she worked everyday at the Production Team. Besides, she remembers how the landlords were struggled by the Propaganda Team and how the brigade called for organizing militiamen. The filmmaker's description of this interview has been translated into English.

单再连1947年出生，是湖南省怀化市溆浦县双井镇双井村的村民。在这段口述中，单老人回忆了大饥荒和文革期间的生活。1958年一开始"合拢饭"随便吃，后来吃食堂时很多人饿死了。父亲为了照顾家里的五个孩子经常到外面找东西吃，各种野菜都吃过。在生产队干活经常要熬夜，被发现偷吃的话还会扣工分。1968年结婚到现在的村子，生活仍然很艰苦，每天在生产队赶工。另外，她还回忆了宣传队斗地主的情况和大队通知搞民兵的经历。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Shu Hengzhang (b.1948) is a resident of Shuangjing Village, Shuangjing Town, Xupu County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province. In this interview, Shu recalls experiences during the Great Famine and Cultural Revolution. On the day grandpa starved to death in 1961, his father and he encountered thieves who stole cattles from the Production Team. He also remembers some people who starved to death. During the Cultural Revolution, they had to ask for instructions in the morning and report results in the evening, and sing different songs.
舒恒章1948年出生，是湖南省怀化市溆浦县双井镇双井村的村民。在这段口述中，舒老人回忆了大饥荒和文革时的经历。1961年外公饿死的那天，他和父亲遇到了从生产队偷牛的小偷。他也记得几个当时饿死的人。文革时要早请示晚汇报，还唱不同的歌。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Shu Qingfa (b.1935) is a resident of Shuangjing Village, Shuangjing Town, Xupu County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province. In this interview, He tells about Shu Family History compilation in Minguo Period. He also recalls life after 1949.
舒清发1935年出生，是湖南省怀化市溆浦县双井镇双井村的村民。在这段口述中，舒老人回忆了民国舒氏族谱修谱的事情。以及后来解放后的事情。

did.unittitle: Tangwan Village | 怀化市溆浦县双井镇塘湾村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Tangwan Village is located in Xupu County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and flimed by Liu Hongli.
塘湾村位于湖南省怀化市溆浦县北斗溪乡。村民的录像采访人是刘红丽。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Xia Wangmei (b. 1917) is a resident of Tangwan Village, Hunan Province. In this interview, Xia recalls the impoverished life during the Great Famine and the villagers who died of starvation. Because she had too many kids, Xia had to stay at home and take care of them. However, she also needed to make five pairs of straw sandals for the production team everyday for 3 work points. Since the grain the kids got was very little, Xia saved her own portion for the kids and ate chaffs and vegetables. Nonetheless, six out of her nine kids died of starvation. Many villagers developed edema because of hunger, and the treatment was to eat a kind of candy made from dates.
夏望梅1917年出生，是湖南省怀化市溆浦县双井镇塘湾村村民。在这段口述中，夏老人回忆了大饥荒时缺衣少食的生活和饿死的村民。因为孩子多，夏老人当时只能在家带孩子，但每天还要给生产队交五双草鞋挣三个工分。由于孩子分到的粮食很少，夏老人便省下粮食给孩子，自己吃糠和野菜，尽管如此，九个孩子里还是饿死了六个。好多村民都饿得得了浮肿，治疗方法就是吃枣子做的糖。

did.unittitle: Songlin Village | 怀化市溆浦县北斗溪乡松林村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Songlin Village is located in Xupu County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and flimed by Shu Qiao.
松林村位于湖南省怀化市溆浦县北斗溪乡。村民的录像采访人是舒侨。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Zhang Liangxing (b. 1927) was born in Songlin Village, Xupu County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province. In this interview, Zhang describes the situation of too many people with too little food during the Great Leap Forward. He remembers the method of calculating work points when working on the mountains and the amount of food different people got at People's Commue Canteen after 1959. Due to lack of food, people looked for all kinds of things to eat; those who stole would be struggled and criticized. Four or five people living in his courtyard starved to death as a result of edema disease. The filmmaker's description of this interview has been translated into English. The filmmaker's description of this interview has been translated into English.
张良兴1927年出生于湖南省怀化市溆浦县北斗溪乡松林村。在这段口述中，张老人描述了大跃进时人多粮少的情况。他分别回忆了在山上搞生产时工分的计算方法和59年后在食堂吃饭时不同人的粮食量。因为粮不够，人们找各种东西来吃，但是偷吃的人会被抓去斗争。他的院子里有四五个人饿的得水肿病死了。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Hu Jinlian (b.1938) is a resident of Songlin Village, Xupu County, Hunan Province. In this interview, Hu recalls experiences during the Great Famine. The family of nine only had two labor forces, so sometimes they could not finish the assigned tasks, getting no grains to eat. One time, the warehouse of the Production Team divided public grains secretly. Hu was sent to work elsewhere then and did not get anything; she was so irritated that she reported their activity.
胡金莲1938年出生，是湖南省溆浦县北斗溪乡松林村的村民。在这段口述中，胡老人回忆了大饥荒期间的经历。一家九口人只有两个劳动力，分配的任务有时做不完，粮食没得吃。队里的仓库还曾经把公粮偷分了。当时被调去外面的胡金莲因为没分到感到很气愤，在开会时告发了分粮食的人。

did.unittitle: Xinhua Village | 怀化市溆浦县双井镇新华村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Xinhua Village is located in Xupu County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and flimed by Shu Qiao.
新华村位于湖南省怀化市溆浦县北斗溪乡。村民的录像采访人是舒侨。

did.unittitle: Yanyuan Village | 怀化市溆浦县双井镇岩远村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Yanyuan Village is located in Xupu County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and flimed by Shu Qiao.
岩远村位于湖南省怀化市溆浦县北斗溪乡。村民的录像采访人是舒侨。

did.unittitle: Huanlingqiao Village | 永州市新田县龙泉镇环灵桥村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Huanlingqiao Village is located in Xintian County, Yongzhou City, Hunan Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and flimed by Zhang Haishen.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Zhang Xiaofa (b. 1935) is a resident of Huanlingqiao Village, Longquan Town, Xintian County, Yongzhou City, Hunan Province. In this interview, Zhang recalls how the people's commune canteen was first established in production teams, and later in villages, when the villagers began to suffer from hunger. A few died of starvation while many suffered from hunger-related diseases.
张孝发（1935年生）是湖南省永州市新田县龙泉镇环灵桥村人。在这段口述中，张老人回忆了兴办食堂开始以生产队为单位，后来以村为单位。后期人们在食堂吃不饱饭，少数人饿死，大多数人由于饥饿患病的情况。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Chen Xinfeng (b. 1928) is a resident of Huanlingqiao Village, Longquan Town, Xintian County, Yongzhou City, Hunan Province. In this interview, Zhang recalls that yam is the main food at the people's commune canteen, but was far from enough. A lot of people had to work on the reservoir construction. Life was so hard in those days that some people hanged themselves. A transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
陈新凤（1928年生）是湖南省永州市新田县龙泉镇环灵桥村人。在这段口述中，陈老人回忆了公社食堂里红薯是主要的食物，经常吃不饱。主要劳力都被掉去修水库，日子非常苦，有些人上吊自杀。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Chen Qingfen (b. 1932) is a resident of Huanlingqiao Village, Longquan Town, Xintian County, Yongzhou City, Hunan Province. In this interview, Chen recalls the construction of the reservoir during the Geat Leap Forward and how many people committed suicide because of hunger and the hard work for the reservoir construction.
陈清芬（1932年生）是湖南省永州市新田县龙泉镇环灵桥井头村人。在这段口述中，陈老人回忆了大跃进时期修水库，以及很多人熬不过饥饿与修水库的辛苦而上吊的情况。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Yuan Renxiu (b. 1938) is a resident of Huanlingqiao Village, Longquan Town, Xintian County, Yongzhou City, Hunan Province. In this interview, Yuan recalls that men in the village were all sent to build the reservior and women had to do all the work in the field.
袁仁秀（1938年生）是湖南省永州市新田县龙泉镇环灵桥村人。在这段口述中，袁老人回忆村里的男人们都被派去修水库，女人们要干所有的农活。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Su Jinxiu (b. 1938) was born in Jingtou Village, Longquan Town, Yongzhou City, Hunan Province. She gave birth to her daughter (the interviewer's mother) in 1959. In this interview, Su recalls the difficulties during the Great Famine as a new mother, such as earning work points, having little to eat in People's Commue Dining Hall. She also remembers that many people got edema disease at that time. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
苏金秀1938年出生于湖南省永州市新田县龙泉镇环灵桥井头村。她在1959年生下的女儿（采访者的母亲）。在这段口述中，苏老人回忆了她作为新母亲在大饥荒期间的困难，例如挣工分和吃食堂。她还记得那时许多人得了水肿病。

did.unittitle: Oujiatang Village | 永州市新田县龙泉镇欧家塘村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Oujiatang Village is located in Xintian County, Yongzhou City, Hunan Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and flimed by Zhang Haishen.
欧家塘村位于湖南省永州市新田县龙泉镇。村民的录像采访人是张海深。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Wang Laosan (b. 1947) is a resident of Oujiatang Village, Longquan Town, Xintian County, Yongzhou City, Hunan Province. In this interview, Wang recalls how he was sent back to the countryside from school to participate in constructing ditches in 1959, and how he suffered from hunger in the people's commune canteen and thus ate wild herbs. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
王老三（1947年生）是湖南省永州市新田县龙泉镇欧家塘村人。在这段口述中，王老人回忆了1959年自己从学校回农村参加修渠道劳动，以及在食堂吃不饱饭以野菜野草充饥的情况。

did.unittitle: Wulitang Village | 永州市新田县五里塘村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Wulitang Village is located in Xintian County, Yongzhou City, Hunan Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and flimed by Zhang Haishen.
五里塘村位于湖南省永州市新田县龙泉镇。村民的录像采访人是张海深。

did.unittitle: Xiacheling Village | 永州市新田县下车岭村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Xiacheling Village is located in Xintian County, Yongzhou City, Hunan Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and flimed by Zhang Haishen.
下车岭村位于湖南省永州市新田县龙泉镇。村民的录像采访人是张海深。

did.unittitle: Luwan Village | 徐州市沛县鹿湾村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Luwan Village is located in Pei County, Xuzhou City, Jiangsu Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and filmed by Li Yushan.
鹿湾村位于江苏省徐州市沛县。村民的录像采访人是李雨珊。

did.unittitle: Feng XinYing & Feng Xinlan | 冯欣英 & 冯欣兰

dao.xlink:title: Interview with Feng XinYing & Feng Xinlan

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Xu Degui (b. 1939) is a resident of Luwan Village, Jiangsu Province. In this interview, Xu talks about his experience during the Great Famine. In 1958 Xu went to work in the city. When he came back to the village, many villagers had developed edema disease because of starvation. To cure the patients, the government distributed tofu water made of soybeans. In 1963, although according to the state policy, Xu had to return to his village, he decided to move to Xiaoxian, Anhui Province and worked on the railroad construction. According to Xu, the famine was even worse there and there were even cases of people eating human flesh. An acquaintance of his hid a jar of food in a well and therefore survived the famine. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
徐德圭1939年出生，是江苏省徐州市沛县鹿湾村村民。在这段口述中，徐老人回忆了大饥荒时的经历。徐老人1958年上城里参加工作，后来回农村看到很多人因为挨饿得了浮肿病。为了治病，政府给病人发大豆做成的豆腐水喝。1963年，根据国家政策，徐老人应该回农村工作，但他选择去安徽萧县修铁路。据徐老人回忆，萧县那一带更加困难，甚至有人吃人的情况。他认识的一位老人靠把装有粮食的罐子藏到井底才没挨饿。

did.unittitle: Hu Yuxiang & Xu Deyu | 胡玉香 & 徐德玉

dao.xlink:title: Interview with Hu Yuxiang & Xu Deyu

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Lei Dianxi (b. 1931) is a resident of Luwan Village, Jiangsu Province. In this interview, Lei talks about his difficult life during the Great Famine. When the famine started in 1957, there was a shortage of all kinds of food and materials. People were so hungry that they had to find wild herbs to eat. Lei used to work at the local public security bureau and therefore read about reports on people eating human flesh in Henan Province. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
雷电喜1931年出生，是江苏省徐州市沛县鹿湾村村民。在这段口述中，雷老人回忆了大饥荒时的艰苦生活。1957年开始生活十分困难，缺衣少食，大家饿得都去地里挖野菜。雷老人在公安局工作，曾看到文件说河南有不少吃人肉的事情发生。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Miao Qianzhi (b. 1946) is a resident of Luwan Village, Jiangsu Province. Miao's family used to be a landlord and her father left for Taiwan many years ago. In this interview, Miao talks about the starving experience in 1963. Miao's mother fled back to her family in Hebei Province with Miao's little sister, while Miao was left at home and attended by someone else. In exchange of food, Miao sold all the 13 mu of land left by her father. During that time, people would do anything, including selling kids, for food. Some villager bought a 7-year-old boy from Suzhou for 200 Yuan. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
苗千芝1946年出生，是江苏省徐州市沛县鹿湾村村民。苗老人家曾是地主，苗老人的父亲在台湾。在这段口述中苗老人回忆了1963年挨饿的经历。当时苗老人的母亲带着妹妹逃荒去河北娘家，苗老人留在徐州由别人照顾，靠卖爸爸留下的十三亩地换粮食吃。当时还有人为了吃饭卖孩子，村里一个人在苏州花了200块钱买了个七岁的男孩。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Shan Xiu'e (b. 1942) is a resident of Luwan Village, Jiangsu Province. In this interview, Shan recalls the life during the Great Famine. When working at the production team for work points, people had to work day and night. No food would be provided if someone skipped work. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
善秀娥1942年出生，是江苏省徐州市沛县鹿湾村村民。在这段口述中，善老人讲述了大饥荒时的生活。当时在生产队干活挣工分，从早做到晚，如果不去干活就没有饭吃。

did.unittitle: Nainaimiao Village | 吉安市吉州区樟山镇奶奶庙

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Nainaimiao Village is located in Jizhou County, Ji'an City, Jiangxi Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and filmed by Guo Zhihua.
奶奶庙村位于江西省吉安市吉州区樟山镇。村民的录像采访人是郭志华。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Luo Jinfeng (b. 1925) is a resident of Nainai Village, Jiangxi Province. In this interview, Luo recalls the difficult life during the Great Famine. Luo's husband died of sickness very early. Not able to carry out heavy work, Luo cooked for the communal canteen to earn a living. At that time, a man got 8 Liang of rice each meal while a woman only got 6. Since she had to save some of her 6 Liang of rice for the kids, Luo was alwasy hungry and had to eat chaff and wild vegetables, and developed constipation.
罗金凤1925年出生，是江西省吉安市奶奶庙村民。在这段口述中，罗老人讲述了大饥荒时的艰难生活。罗老人的丈夫很早就病逝，干不了重活的罗老人只能靠在食堂做饭为生。当时男的一顿饭8两米，女的6两，但她还得省下点粮食给孩子吃，实在吃不饱就吃糠皮、野菜，结果导致便秘。

did.unittitle: Futan Village | 吉安市青原区富滩镇富滩村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Futan Village is located in Qingyuan County, Ji'an City, Jiangxi Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and filmed by Guo Zhihua.
富滩村位于江西省吉安市青原区富滩镇。村民的录像采访人是郭志华。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Guo Hougui (b. 1941) is a resident of Futan Village, Jiangxi Province. In this interview, Guo talks about the life during the Land Reform and the Great Famine. During the Land Reform in 1949, three people classified as landlords in Futan Village were executed by shooting, including one former head of Ganzhou Country during Kuomintang's regime. In 1958 during the Great Leap Forward, Guo, still at school at that time, went to carry ores for the steel factory. When people were eating at the communal canteen, grains were all sold to the government, people had to earn work points in exchange of grain rations. Because of hunger, they ate chaff, wild vegetables and dried sweet potatoes. Due to the state monopoly over purchase and marketing, every household had to hand in a pig and chickens, even though some didn't even have a pig. From 1957 to 1960, people had to seek permission to kill an ox or a pig. Such a policy was not cancelled until the new policy of"allocation of land to individual households" started.

郭厚桂1941年出生，是江西省吉安市富滩镇富滩村村民。在这段口述中，郭老人回忆了土改和大饥荒时的生活。1949年土改期间，富滩村有三个地主被枪毙了，其中包括一位国民党时期的赣州县县长。58年大跃进时，为了炼钢铁，还在读书的郭老人就去担矿石。集体化以后，在食堂吃饭，粮食都交给国家，只能靠挣工分换口粮，吃不饱就吃糠皮、野菜、番薯干。统购统销时，每家都要交一头猪和鸡，没有也要交。57年到60年，杀牛杀猪都要经过批准，直到分田到户之后才取消。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Guo Defu (b. 1941) is a resident of Futan Village, Jiangxi Province. In this interview, Guo talks about the situation during 1958. When eating at the communal canteen, Guo had one bowl of congee for lunch and four for dinner, with each bowl of congee containing around 2 Liang of rice. Guo was still attending school at that time, but he had to go to class in the morning and go to work in the afternoon. No food would be provided if they didn't go to work. Sometimes when he was too starving, Guo would pull out radish roots to eat.
郭德敷1941年出生，是江西省吉安市青原区富滩镇富滩村村民。在这段口述中，郭老人讲述了58年的情况。吃食堂时中午就吃一碗粥，晚上四碗，每碗粥有2两米左右。当时郭老人还在上学，上午上课下午干活，不干活就没饭吃。有时实在饿了，就拔萝卜根吃。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Guo Housong (b. 1925) is a resident of Futan Village, Jiangxi Province. In this interview, Guo talks about the life during the Great Famine. During those years, Guo was working outside most of the time. When working at the rice mill, Guo always stole some rice and sent it home to help his family.
郭厚松1925年出生，是江西省吉安市青原区富滩镇富滩村村民。在这段口述中郭老人回忆了大饥荒时的生活。那几年郭老人都在外打工。在机米厂工作时，郭老人经常偷米运回家接济家人。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Li Jiuxiang (b. 1930) is a resident of Futan Village, Jiangxi Province. In this interview, Li recalls the life in 1958. When eating at the communal canteen, the women could only get 6 Liang of rice for each meal. Because of hunger, people had to eat chaff and wild vegetables. No matter how bad the weather was, the villagers had to work in the field, otherwise they wouldn't get food. Sometimes they were too busy working in the field that their family had to deliver the food to them there.
李九香1930年出生，是江西省吉安市青原区富滩镇后屋家花园巷村民。在这段口述中，李老人回忆了58年的生活。吃食堂时女的一顿只有六两饭，吃不饱就只能吃糠、野菜。天气再恶劣也得出工干活，不然没有饭吃。有时候干活时不能回去吃午饭，只能让家人把饭送到地里去。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ji'an City is located in Qingyuan County, Jiangxi Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and filmed by Guo Zhihua.
吉安市位于江西省。村民的录像采访人是郭志华。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Wang Zhaofeng (b. 1932) is a resident of Ji'an City, Jiangxi Province. In this interview, Wang recalls her early life which was full of hardships. After getting married, she moved to the village she's living now. Wang's family was classified as landlord. As a result, Wang was once criticized in struggle sessions for seven days and nights. Without any grain, Wang had to go back to her parents' house for food. Later Wang made a living through grounding rice for others. She often ate chaff and wild vegetables and saved rice for her kids.
王招凤1932年出生，是江西省吉安市村民。在这段口述中，王老人回忆了自己早年艰苦的生活。嫁到现在居住的村里后，王老人家被划为地主，王老人也一度被拉去批斗了七天七夜，没有粮食的王老人只能回娘家吃饭。之后王老人靠为别人磨谷为生，经常要吃糠皮、野菜，把米粒留给孩子吃。

did.unittitle: Lijia Village|吉安市青原区富滩镇李家村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Lijia Village is located in Qingyuan County, Ji'an City, Jiangxi Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and filmed by Guo Zhihua.
李家村位于江西省吉安市青原区富滩镇。村民的录像采访人是郭志华。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Li Xinfeng (b. 1926) is a resident of Lijia Village, Jiangxi Province.In this interview, Li recalls the life during the Great Leap Forward and Great Famine. In 1958 during the Great Leap Forward, villagers sold all their surplus grain to the government. Li could only make some money by weaving cloth. Life was very difficult during that time. People had to build the road even when it was raining. They sometimes were so busy working in the field and they had their lunch delived there. They had to rely on old people to look after their children. When eating at the communal canteen, people had congee in the morning and rice for lunch and dinner. Everyone's daily grain ration was clearly regulated according to their labor. Whoever did not go to work would not get any food. Because of hunger, Li ate all kinds of leaves and wild vegetables. Lots of kids starved to death in the village.

李新凤1926年出生，是江西省吉安市青原区富滩镇李家村村民。在这段口述里，李老人回忆了大跃进和大饥荒时的生活。58年大跃进时，村民把余粮都卖给了国家，李老人只能靠织布赚钱。当时生活艰苦，下雨天也要去修路。生产队在田里干活没时间吃午饭，就让人把饭送到田里吃，孩子也只能托老人照顾。吃大食堂时，早上喝粥，中午和晚上吃饭。每个人的口粮都按照劳力有明确规定，如果不出工就没有饭吃。因为饥饿，李老人吃过各种叶子和野菜，村里好多孩子饿死。

did.unittitle: Pengtian Village | 抚州市广昌县彭田村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pengtian Village is located in Guangchang County, Fuzhou City, Jiangxi Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and flimed by Yi Yangmin.
彭田村位于江西省抚州市广昌县。村民的录像采访人是易旸敏。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gao Yurong (b. 1933) is a resident of Pengtian Village, Jiangxi Province. In this interview, Gao talks about the hardship during the Great Famine. The communal canteen was established in 1958. While the villagers had to work both day and night at the production team, frequently until midnight, each could only obtain two to three liangs of rice, which were far from enough for either adults or kids. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
高玉荣1933年出生，是江西省抚州市广昌县彭田村村民。在这段口述中，高老人回忆了大饥荒时期的艰苦生活。1958年开始有大食堂，大家白天和晚上都要在生产队干活，经常加班到半夜，但一个人只能分到二三两米，大人小孩都吃不饱。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Yi Guixiang (b. 1945) is a resident of Pengtian Village, Jiangxi Province. In this interview, Yi talks about the difficult time during the Great Famine when she was working at a mold factory. Since 1958, if the villagers did not work at the production team, they would not obtain any food. Since everyone was only assigned with two liangs of rice, the rice had to be cooked with bran, potato scrapes and others. Moreover, there was always a scramble at the canteen for the scarce supply of food. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
夷桂香1945年出生，是江西省抚州市广昌县彭田村村民。在这段口述中，夷老人回忆了大饥荒时的困难生活。从1958年开始，如果不去生产队里干活就没有饭吃，夷老人在磨具厂工作，赚取收入。当时一个人只能分到二两米，和糠、洋芋渣等调在一起烧成饭吃。去大食堂吃饭时如果不争着抢就经常吃不到饭。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gao Wei (b. 1946) is a resident of Pengtian Village, Jiangxi Province. In this interview, Gao talks about the life during the Great Leap Forward and the Great Famine. In Gao's opinion, most leaders and members of the local production team only focused on superficial political slogans and exaggerating production rather than putting real effort into farming, which led to reduced grain production and eventually the famine. The situation did not improve until the communal canteen was closed down. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
高伟1946年出生，是江西省抚州市广昌县彭田村村民。在这段口述中，高老人讲述了大跃进和大饥荒时期的生活。高老人认为，当时生产队经常弄虚作假，只会做表面功夫，实际干活种田时出工不出力，导致粮食减产，造成饥荒。情况直到大食堂解散以后情况才开始好转。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Zeng Lianying (b. 1925) is a resident of Pengtian Village, Jiangxi Province. In this interview, Zeng talks about the life during the Great Famine when she was working at the production team. The workload was very heavy and overtime at night was very common. The famine was at its worst in 1960 and 1961 when each person could only be assigned with 2 liangs of rice everyday. Due to starvation, Zeng sometimes had to steal food. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
曾连英1925年出生，是江西省抚州市广昌县彭田村村民。在这段口述中曾老人讲述了大饥荒时期的生活。曾老人当时在生产队干活，工作辛苦，天天晚上还要加夜班。大饥荒最苦的是60年和61年，一个人只能分到二两米，饿得不行的时候曾老人还偷过饭吃。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Chen Jiumei (b. 1950) is a resident of Pengtian Village, Jiangxi Province. Due to his lack of money in raising kids, Chen's birth father embezzled 200 Yuan and was therefore arrested. Chen was then raised up by her adoptive parents since she was 8 month old. In this interview, Chen talks about the life during the Great Famine. Although no one starved to death in her village, many people stole food because of hunger. However, if caught, the convicted would face severe punishment including fines of money, grains and work points and even going to jail. During that time, many people from other places went to Jiangxi Province to beg for food. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
陈九妹1950年出生，是江西省抚州市广昌县彭田村村民。陈老人的亲生父亲因为没钱养孩子，贪污了两百元被逮捕，于是陈老人在8个月大的时候就被养父母领养。在这段口述中，陈老人回忆了大饥荒时的经历。当时村里虽然没有饿死人，但因为挨饿不少人就去偷吃的，一旦被抓住惩罚很严重，扣钱扣粮扣工分，甚至会坐牢。那时候还有很多外地人来江西讨饭。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Zeng Guiying (b. 1932) is a resident of Pengtian Village, Jiangxi Province. In this interview, Zeng recalls the life during the Great Famine. In 1957 when the communal canteen was established, every household's pots and stoves were confiscated. The famine started in 1958. With three members, Zeng's family was only assigned one jin of rice everyday. The over 200 people at the communal canteen had to scramble for the scarce supply of food at every meal. In fear of hurting the unborn babies, pregnant women did not dare to join them. Because Zeng was usually not strong enough to get her portion of food, she had to rely on the food her dad, who was the leader of the people's commune, saved for her. Because of starvation, many people stole food from others, ate daffodils and even river mud. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
曾桂英1932年出生，是江西省抚州市广昌县彭田村村民，在这段口述中，曾老人回忆了大饥荒时期的经历。1957年村里开始办大食堂，家里的锅炉都被收走。1958年开始挨饿，曾老人一家三口一天只能分一斤米。每次吃饭一个食堂二百多个人争抢粮食，怀孕的害怕压到小孩都不敢去。曾老人当时抢不到饭，只能靠当社长的父亲分她一点粮食。因为挨饿有人便去偷吃的，甚至吃河泥、水仙花等。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Li Zhenzhu (b. 1939) is a resident of Pengtian Village, Jiangxi Province. In this interview, Li recalls the life during the Great Famine. Li started chopping firewood and sold them at the canteen with her father since she was 7 years old. During the Great Famine, everyone could only obtain two liangs of rice. To fill the stomach, they had to eat potato and sweet potato scrapes, which were usually to dry to be swallowed. The situation did not improve until when the communal canteen was closed and when people could have their own farming lands. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
李珍珠1939年出生，是江西省抚州市广昌县彭田村村民。在这段口述中，李老人讲述了大饥荒时的生活。李老人7岁起就和父亲一起去砍柴、挑柴去食堂卖。大饥荒时一天只有二两米，不够就只能吃红薯渣、洋芋渣之类的，非常干，难以下咽。直到大食堂解散，人民可以分田种，生活才得以改善。

did.unittitle: Huanzidong Village | 沈阳市法库县獾子洞村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Huanzidong Village is located in Faku County, Shenyang City, Liaoning Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and filmed by Lin Tao.
獾子洞村位于辽宁省沈阳市法库县。村民的录像采访人是林涛。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Lin Fuchen (b. 1936) is a resident of Huanzidong Village, Shenyang, Liaoning Province. In this interview, Lin recalls the life during the Great Famine. When there was a good harvest in 1958, the corns that were not consumed were wasted and directly buried in the field. Then from 1959 the Great Famine started. Lin was working at Sanjiazi Coal Mine where he was given 55 jins of grains each month. Although he did not starve, the work there was very hard. During that time many people starved to death on the street, but no one had the strength to bury the dead bodies. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
林福臣1936年出生，是沈阳市法库县獾子洞村村民。在这段口述中，林老人回忆了大饥荒时的生活。1958年大丰收时，吃不完的玉米棒子就直接埋地里浪费了，到了1959年就开始挨饿。林老人在三家煤矿工作，一个月给五十五斤粮食，但工作非常辛苦。当时不少人饿死在路边，但也没有人有力气去埋葬尸体。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Cui Suzhen (b. 1931) is a resident of Huanzidong Village, Shenyang, Liaoning Province. In this interview, Cui recalls the life during the Great Famine. Cui was working at the town's clothing shop where she could earn work credits and eat at the canteen. Her husband was working in Haerbin, Heilongjiang Province. Because they only had one kid and her husband's parents to feed, the family did not starve too much during that time.
崔素贞1931年出生，是沈阳市法库县獾子洞村村民。在这段口述中，崔老人回忆了大饥荒时期的生活。当时崔老人在城里的成衣铺工作，可以换工分，一天两顿都在食堂吃。崔老人的丈夫在哈尔滨工作，家里就一个孩子和公公婆婆，所以一家并没有太饿着。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Bai Xiuqing (b. 1923) is a resident of Huanzidong Village, Shenyang, Liaoning Province. In this interview, Bai talks about her experience of feeding the eleven family members during the Great Famine. Bai's husband was the head cook at the production team, while Bai worked at home cooking and doing needlework. During the collectivization when every household had to hand in their food to the production team, Bai's family hided some at their place. As a result, they did not suffer too much during the Great Famine.
白秀清1923年出生，是沈阳市法库县獾子洞村村民。在这段口述中，白老人回忆了大饥荒时期照顾家里十一口人吃喝的经历。白老人的丈夫在生产队当伙夫长，老人一个人在家烧饭做针线活。集体化的时候粮食都归生产队，白老人家偷存了点粮食，所以大饥荒时没太饿着。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Zhang Zhihua (b. 1946) is a resident of Huanzidong Village, Shenyang, Liaoning Province. In this interview, Zhang recalls the life during the Great Famine. There were people who fled to Huanzidong Village from Hebei Province, while many local villagers fled to the Great Northern Wilderness for the relatively sufficient foods there. Zhang also talks about several villagers who starved to death during the Great Famine. Niu Fengtian's grandpa starved to death during sleep the day before the Chinese New Year. Without a proper coffin and clothes, he was buried in a crate that was used to contain soybean oil. In addition, many people died of food poisoning because of eating wild herbs and tree leaves. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
张志华1946年出生，是沈阳市法库县獾子洞村村民。在这段口述中，张老人讲述了大饥荒时期的生活。当时獾子洞有从河北逃难过来的，当地也有不少人逃到粮食相对充足的北大荒去。张老人还回忆了几位饿死的村民，其中牛丰田的爷爷是在春节前一天睡觉时饿死的，当时没有棺材和新衣服埋葬死者，只能用裝豆油的木箱充当棺材。除了饿死，还有好多人因为吃野菜、树叶导致食物中毒而死。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pan Zhenhua (b. 1945) is a resident of Huanzidong Village, Shenyang, Liaoning Province. In this interview, Pan talks about the life during the Great Famine. Despite the reduced production, the cadres of the local production teams exaggerated the numbers in their report to the higher government for their own profit. As a result, the grains were taken to the higher level government and ordinary villagers had to starve. The situation was at its worst in 1960, when many people starved to death and corpses were put in cabinets due to the lack of coffins. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
潘振华1945年出生，是沈阳市法库县獾子洞村村民。在这段口述中，潘老人讲述了大饥荒时的经历。当时粮食减产，但生产队干部为了自己的利益向上级政府虚报收成，导致粮食都被上缴而百姓只能挨饿。60年情况最严重，好多人饿死，因为没有棺材，尸体只能用柜子装。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Yang Deshan (b. 1934) is a resident of Huanzidong Village, Shenyang, Liaoning Province. In this interview, Yang talks about the life during the Great Famine. The communal canteen was established in 1958: everyone had to eat there and no one was allowed to cook at home. 1958 saw a very good harvest, yet people wasted a lot of food. 1960 saw a much reduced production and the country had to pay back the debt to the Soviet Union, the Great Famine started as a result. Yang was working as the warehouse keeper at the production team, so he could sneak out some food for his family to keep them from starving. However, many villagers starved to death, especially the elderly and the sick. There were foods in the granary but because it was the government's grain reserves in case of war, the government did not open the granary even though people were starving. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.

杨德山1934年出生，是沈阳市法库县獾子洞村村民。在这段口述中，杨老人回忆了大饥荒时的生活。1958年成立大食堂，不许各家烧火，要求人们都上食堂吃饭。1958年大丰收粮食多，不少人都浪费粮食，到60年粮食就减产了，加上要还苏联外债，饥荒开始了。杨老人因为是在生产队当保管长，可以拿点粮食回家，所以他们家没太挨饿，但好多村民都饿死，尤其是老人和病人。当时粮库虽然有粮食，但因为是国家的储备粮，所以并没有发放给挨饿的百姓。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Yang Zhizhong (b. 1934) is a resident of Huanzidong Village, Shenyang, Liaoning Province. In this interview, Yang talks about his life during and after the Great Famine. Back then Yang's family was at his wife's hometown, Tongliao, Inner Mongolia. Foods were sufficient there, so Yang's family did not starve much. Yang was working on a livestock farm, but in order to make extra money, he hunted wild birds during his spare time.
杨志忠1934年出生，是沈阳市法库县獾子洞村村民。在这段口述中，杨老人回忆了大饥荒时期及之后的生活。当时杨老人在他老伴老家内蒙古省通辽市，那边粮食充足，老人一家并没挨饿。杨老人在牧场工作，为了多挣点外快，他还在业余时打野鸟卖钱。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Yin Tingzhi (b. 1929) is a resident of Huanzidong Village, Shenyang, Liaoning Province. In this interview, Yin talks about her experience of fleeing to the Great Northern Wilderness where foods were relatively sufficient during the Great Famine. In order to make money for the trip, Yin's family sold the wooden parts of their house to the Sanjiazi Coal Mine, but they had to keep the land because everyone was starving and no one wanted it. In the Great Northern Wilderness, Yin's husband worked for the local production team. The family of six had to sleep on a small bed extended by a piece of plank. After six months, because it was too cold there and her daughter was old enough to get married, Yin's family moved back to Huanzidong Village. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
尹廷芝1929年出生，是沈阳市法库县獾子洞村村民。在这段口述中，尹老人回忆了大饥荒时期逃难到粮食相对充足的北大荒的经历。为了凑够路费，尹老人一家把房子的木结构卖给三家子煤矿，但因为饥荒没人需要地皮，他们只能自己留下。到了北大荒后尹老人的丈夫在生产队工作，一家六口人就睡在一个小炕上，一边还拿木板接着。待了半年以后因为北大荒太冷，女儿也到了该结婚的年纪，尹老人全家又搬回了獾子洞。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Yin Tingxiang (b. 1942) is a resident of Huanzidong Village, Shenyang, Liaoning Province. In this interview, Yin recalls the life during the Great Famine. Many people were starving to death and the dead bodies were stacked up on the streets. Yin was still at school during that time. However, because of the famine, they did not have any class but all went out to dig wild herbs and tree barks for extra sustenance. Many people fled to Jilin and Heilongjiang Province because there were more foods there.
尹廷祥1942年出生，是沈阳市法库县獾子洞村村民。在这段口述中，尹老人回忆了大饥荒时期的生活。那时村里饿死不少人，尸体堆得很高。尹老人当时还在上学，但因为大家都挨饿，学校也不上课，大家都去挖野菜吃树皮。好多人都逃到吉林、黑龙江等粮食相对充足的地方。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Yang Wanxiang (b. 1922) is a resident of Huanzidong Village, Shenyang, Liaoning Province. In this interview, Yang recalls the life during the Great Famine. Yang was working as the supervisor of the village's production team. In 1959, everyone was still eating at the communal canteen, but starting from 1960 when the famine was at its worst, people had to eat at home. Many starved to death in that year. The situation began to improve in 1961. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
杨万祥1922年出生，是辽宁省沈阳市法库县獾子洞村村民。在这段口述中，杨万祥回忆了大饥荒时期的生活。杨老师当时是村里生产队的指导员。村里1959年还在大食堂吃饭，到了1960年就回家里吃饭，那一年最困难，村里饿死了不少人。情况直到1961年才有所好转。

did.unittitle: Chenjia Village | 滨州市阳信县商店镇陈家村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Chenjia Village is located in Yangxin County, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and filmed by Zou Xueping.
陈家村位于山东省滨州市阳信县商店镇。村民的录像采访人是邹雪平。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Si Jinguan (b.1935) lives in Chenjia Village, Shangdian Town, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. In this interview, Si recalls life during the Great Famine. She and her husband were in their 20s, but the hunger weakened them so much that they coulnd't do any work. They ate all kinds of leaves and wild herbs. Several people starved to death in the village.
司金官1935年出生，是山东省滨州市阳信县商店镇陈家村人。在这段口述中，司老人回忆了大饥荒时期的生活。因为挨饿，那时才二十几岁的她和他丈夫都干不动活，各种树叶和野菜都拿来吃。村里饿死了好几个人。

did.unittitle: Guanzhuang Village | 滨州市阳信县劳店乡官庄村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Guanzhuang Village is located in Yangxin County, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and filmed by Zou Xueping.
官庄村位于山东省滨州市阳信县劳店乡。村民的录像采访人是邹雪平。

did.unittitle: Xiaoyin Village | 滨州市阳信县商店镇小殷村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Xiaoyin Village is located in Yangxin County, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and filmed by Zou Xueping.
小殷村位于山东省滨州市阳信县商店镇。村民的录像采访人是邹雪平。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Li Hongying (b. 1941) is a resident of Xiaoyin Village, Shangdian Town, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. In this interview, Li remembers life during the Great Famine. Beginning in 1958, people worked together in the field (called 'large formation combat'). They were starving and looking everywhere for things to eat. Only later did people get some food at People's Commune canteen. That year, four people in her family starved to death.
李红英1941年出生，是山东省滨州市阳信县商店镇小殷村的村民。在这段口述中，李老人回忆了大饥荒时的生活。1958年开展'大兵团作战'，人们挨着饿在地里干活，四处找东西吃。之后吃上食堂才分到些食物。她家里那一年饿死了四口人。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Yin Huizhang (b. 1939) is a resident of Xiaoyin Village, Shangdian Town, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. In this interview, Yin remembers life during the Great Famine. He used to be the barn keeper of the Production Team, yet he didn't see grains for six months between 1959 and 1960. Later, people could get half jin (250 grams) of food each day after working. In the worst year, more than 800 people, about half of the population in Shawo Village and Guanzhuang Village either starved to death or left (migrated to the Northeast, re-married, etc.).
殷会章1939年出生，是山东省滨州市阳信县商店镇小殷村的村民。在这段口述中，殷老人回忆了大饥荒时的生活。他当时是生产队的粮食保管，1959年到1960年期间有六个月没见过粮食。在此之后人们干了活能在食堂领半斤粮食。那一年沙窝村和官庄村饿死的和离开的（逃去东北、改嫁等等）总共有八百多人，约原人口的一半。

did.unittitle: Zoujia Village | 滨州市阳信县商店镇邹家村

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Zoujia Village is located in Yangxin County, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. Interviews in this sub-series were conducted and filmed by Zou Xueping.
邹家村位于山东省滨州市阳信县商店镇。村民的录像采访人是邹雪平。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Li Guiying (b.1925) is a resident of Zoujia Village, Shangdian Town, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. In this interview, Li recalls her experience during the Great Famine. At that time, people were so starved that they were too weak to do anything, and they ate whatever they could find. Many people in the village starved to death.
李桂英1925年出生，是山东省滨州市阳信县商店镇邹家村的村民。在这段口述中，李老人回忆了大饥荒期间的经历。那时人们饿得做什么都没力气，也找来各种东西吃。村里饿死得人不少。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Chen Fengying (b. 1937) was born in Zoujia Village, Shangdian Town, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. In this interview, Chen talks about what she ate during the Great Famine. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
陈凤英1937年出生于山东省滨州市阳信县商店镇邹家村。 在这段口述中，陈老人讲述了她在大饥荒期间吃的食物。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Fu Yu'e (b.1926) is a resident of Zoujia Village, Shangdian Town, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. In this interview, Fu recalls her experience during the Great Famine. When People's Commune canteen started, she had a daughter, and she gave birth to her younger son in 1960. In order to save food for her children, she was often so starved that she could barely move.
付玉娥1926年出生，是山东省滨州市阳信县商店镇邹家村的村民。在这段口述中，付老人回忆了大饥荒期间的经历。吃食堂时她已经有了个女儿，1960年生下了小儿子。为了省下粮食给孩子吃，她常常饿得动弹不得。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Du Fengying (b. 1935) was born in Zoujia Village, Shangdian Town, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. In this interview, Du recalls her experience at home and at People's Commune canteen during the Great Famine. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
杜凤英1935年出生于山东省滨州市阳信县商店镇邹家村。在这段口述中，杜老人回忆了大饥荒期间她在家里和公社食堂的经历。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gao Yurong (b. 1941) was born in Zoujia Village, Shangdian Town, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. Four of Gao's family members died during the Great Famine. In this interview, she talks about People's Commune canteen, and those who starved to death, particularly her mother-in-law and grandmother. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
高玉荣1941年出生于山东省滨州市阳信县商店镇邹家村。她家在大饥荒期间死了四口人。 在这段口述中，高老人说起了公社食堂和饿死的人，特别是她的婆婆和奶奶。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Lv Junrong (b. 1946) was born in Zoujia Village, Shangdian Town, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. In this oral history, Lv remembers how people suffered and what they ate during the Great Famine.
吕俊荣1946年出生于山东省滨州市阳信县商店镇邹家村。在这段口述历史中， 吕老人回忆了大饥荒期间人们受的磨难和吃的食物。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Zou Dengke (b. 1938) was born in Zoujia Village, Shangdian Town, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. In this interview, Zou recalls life during the Great Famine. In the beginning, Zou and his wife tried everything to earn money for food, saving most food for their children. After the People's Commune canteen was established, he could get food after carrying coal every day, and life became slightly better. Although he saw food get wasted and knows that the famine was not a natural disaster, Zou still insist that the famine is not caused by Chairman Mao's policy, but the cadres at the local level.
邹登科1938年出生于山东省滨州市阳信县商店镇邹家村。在这段口述中，邹老人回忆了大饥荒时期的生活。饥荒刚开始的时候，他和妻子用各种办法挣钱换吃的，还把吃的省給孩子们。食堂办起来后，他每天去推碳能分到粮食，生活稍微好转了些。虽然邹登科看见过好好的粮食被糟蹋，也知道饥荒不是自然灾害，他却强调说这不是因为毛主席的政策，而是下边的官有问题。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Zou Ailing (b.1941) was born in Zoujia Village, Shangdian Town, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. She is Zou Quantang's older sister. In this interview, Zou clearly remembers the starvation she experienced during the Great Famine. When the 'Five Winds' first started, people had nothing to eat and the People's Commune canteen was not set up; Zou has eaten anything she could find. During the famine, her mother and two uncles all starved to death. The situation improved slightly later and people could eat sweet potato after earning work points, but many children starved to death.
邹爱玲1941年出生于山东省滨州市阳信县商店镇邹家村。她是邹全堂的姐姐。在这段口述中，邹老人讲述了她记忆深刻的大饥荒期间挨饿的经历。刚开始'刮五风'时，人们没有粮食，集体食堂也没有建立，邹爱玲什么都找来吃过。她的大伯，二伯和母亲都在这段时间饿死了。后来稍有好转，挣了工分能吃地瓜，但饿死了不少孩子。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Zou Jinping (b. 1941) is a resident of Zoujia Village, Shangdian Town, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. In this interview, Zou describes life during the Great Famine when there was severe shortage of food, even cooking utensils.
邹金萍1941年出生，是山东省滨州市阳信县商店镇邹家村的村民。在这段口述中， 邹老人描述了大饥荒期间食物和炊具都匮乏的生活。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Zou Peiji (b. 1944) was born in Zoujia Village, Shangdian Town, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. In this interview, Zou recalls the difficult time during the Great Famine, when two people died every day in the village and nobody worked in the field. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
邹佩吉1944年出生于山东省滨州市阳信县商店镇邹家村。在这段口述中，邹老人回忆了三年饥荒最困难的时期；村子里每天饿死两个人，地里也没人干活。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Li Yutian (b. 1940) was born in Zoujia Village, Shangdian Town, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. He went to Boshan to work at a steel furnace in 1958. In this interview, Li talks about what and how he ate during the Great Famine.
李玉田1940年出生于山东省滨州市阳信县商店镇邹家村。1958年他去了博山炼钢铁。在这段口述中，李老人讲述了他在大饥荒期间吃了什么，怎么吃的。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Li Xintian (b.1934) is a resident of Zoujia Village, Shangdian Town, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. In this interview, Li talks about his experience during the Great Famine. The most bitters days started in the later half of 1959, when People's Commune Canteen had no food. Not only were grains extremely lacking, but both men and women also had to go dredging and ditching, leaving the elder and children at home. The starving people were forced to eat anything they could find. More than eighty people in his village starved to death, including his mother and two grandmothers. Life became a little better in the later half of 1961, when eight liang of grains was offered.
李鑫田1934年出生，是山东省滨州市阳信县商店镇邹家村的村民。在这段口述中，李老人讲述了大饥荒时期的经历。最苦是1959年的下半年，食堂都吃不上了。不仅分的粮食远远不够吃，还不管男女都要到出去挖河挖沟，只剩下老人和孩子在家。挨饿的人们被逼得什么都吃。村里饿死了八十几个人，包括他的母亲和两个奶奶。1961年下半年开始按'八大两供应'，生活才好了一些。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Zhao Changfeng (b. 1941) is a resident of Zoujia Village, Shangdian Town, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. In this interview, Zhao recalls her experience during the Great Famine. When she was seventeen, she went begging with her mother; due to his lame leg, her father stayed home and made bamboo baskets in exchange of food. Later, she went begging in another county with a girl called Xiao Huan, walking long distances on foot and very scared of people's dogs. At that time, it was fortunate to get even just a little food from others. At 18 years old, she worked in the field for work points and ate anything she could find.
赵长凤1941年出生，是山东省滨州市阳信县商店镇邹家村的村民。在这段口述中，赵老人回忆了大饥荒期间的经历。她17岁时和母亲一起去要饭，父亲因为腿瘸待在家里编箩筐换粮食。后来她也和另一个姑娘小寰一起走着去别的县要饭，最怕别人家里的狗。那时偶尔要到几口干粮已经觉得不错。18岁的时候在地里干活，饿得什么都找来吃。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Zhang Xirong (b. 1936) was born in Zoujia Village, Shangdian Town, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. In this interview, Zhang talks about eating at People's Commune canteen and at home during the Great Famine. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
张希荣1936年出生于山东省滨州市阳信县商店镇邹家村。 在这段口述中， 张老人描述了大饥荒期间在公社食堂和家里吃饭的情况。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Wang Xiuqin (b. 1936) was born in Zoujia Village, Shangdian Town, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. During the Great Famine, Wang and her husband were working in a nearby town named Zhangjiadian, where they survived the hardest time. She says that she does not know the reason for the famine. She only heard that their team leader's superiors refused to give out food, and that there was grain in the barns but it was not for villagers.
王秀芹1936年出生于山东省滨州市阳信县商店镇邹家村。大饥荒期间，王秀芹和她的丈夫在附近一个叫张家店的镇子干活，熬过了最困难的时候。她说她不清楚饥荒的原因，只听说上级不发给队长粮食，以及仓库里面有粮食，但不能发给村里人。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Song Qiuying (b. 1928) was born in Zoujia Village, Shangdian Town, Binzhou City, Shandong Province. During the Great Famine, many of Song's family members (including her father and son) died of starvation. She is one of the interviewees in the documentary The Starving Village (2010) by Zou Xueping. In this interview, Song describes the days before the death of her 11-year-old son. The transcript of this interview has been translated into English.
宋秋英1928年出生于山东省滨州市阳信县商店镇邹家村。大饥荒期间，宋老人的许多家人（包括父亲和儿子）都饿死了。 她也是邹雪平的纪录片《饥饿的村子》（2010）中被采访的人之一。 在这段口述中，宋老人描述了她11岁的大儿子临死前的生活。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
